column1: @entity4's grandmother was studying at a school in @entity1.  She lived at the schoolyear round.  So @entity4's mother put him on a bus to the city and his grandmother picked himup at the @entity0 bus stop.  They took the train back to the school.  They put@entity4's backpack on a rack in the guest room.  Then @entity4 and his grandmother went out fora walk.  They stopped at a corner shop for pizza and sodas.  Then they walked to the@entity3 Building.  At the top of the @entity3 Building they looked out over thecity.  They counted all the bridges and looked at all the tall buildings.  @entity4 boughtthree postcards and a little snow globe in the shop. Then they took the elevator back tothe ground floor.  Next they took a yellow cab to @entity2.  They rode the carouseland went to the zoo.  @entity4's favorite animals were the monkeys.  He did not like thesnakes at all.  After they had ice cream cones, @entity4 and his grandmother took the trainback to her school.  They had salads for supper.  Then they read a story together.@entity4's grandmother made up her sofa bed for @entity4 as they made plans for the next day.@entity4 wanted to know if they could go to a baseball game.  His grandmother said she wouldget tickets.
